title: Starling Cycles Announces Complete Builds and GIVE IT THE BEANS!
content:
John and Josh love their Mumurs and others here at The Radavist have lauded Starling’s steel single pivots. To help get ya rollin’ on bikes, the UK framebuilders just announced complete bikes. To commemorate these slick builds, Triscombe local Toby Downs takes the Mega Twist on a proper flogging. Check out more info below!

Joe started Starling by making small-batch, handmade frames and offering a range of components to build them up with. They brand has always (kind of) offered complete bikes, but they’ve always been custom builds or limited runs.

Now, for the first time ever, Starling is offering an all-singing, all-dancing, just-like-the-big-dogs-do-it range of full-build bikes.

They can be ordered from Starling’s website, built up, and shipped directly to your door—just stick the front wheel in, whack the bars on, and you’re hot to trot. And, yes, Starling will ship these internationally, not just to the UK.

The new collection includes all of Starling’s Core Bikes – that’s the Murmur, Mini Murmur, Mega Murmur, Twist, Mega Twist and Roost.

Check out more at Starling Cycles.

The post Starling Cycles Announces Complete Builds and GIVE IT THE BEANS! appeared first on The Radavist.
author: John Watson
